channel.title: media conglomerate on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in media conglomerate on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Thomson Reuters Logo Thomson Reuters Corporation is a Canada-based multinational media conglomerate. The company was founded in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, where it is headquartered at 333 Bay Street. Thomson Reuters was created by the Thomson Corporation’s purchase of the British company Reuters Group in April 2008 and is majority owned by The Woodbridge Company, a holding company for the Thomson family. Source
You can download theThomsonlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Thomson
item.description: Thomson Reuters Corporation is a Canada-based multinational media conglomerate. The company was founded in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, where it is headquartered at 333 Bay Street. Thomson Reuters was created by the Thomson Corporation’s purchase of the British company Reuters Group in April 2008 and is majority owned by The Woodbridge Company, a holding company for the Thomson family. Source
